original_text: Ahab's wife, Jezebel, came in to his room. She asked him, ‘Why are you so upset? Why do you refuse to eat anything?’
korean_text: 그의 아내 이세벨이 그에게 나아와 이르되 왕의 마음에 무엇을 근심하여 식사를 아니하나이까

sentences.original_text: Ahab's wife, Jezebel, came in to his room
sentences.korean_translation: 아합의 아내 이세벨이 그의 방으로 들어왔다

sentences.original_text: Why do you refuse to eat anything?
